translation.en: is expected to make landfall early this evening.

translation.en: [mom] Oh.

translation.en: "The house is yours. Sell it."

translation.en: "There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."

translation.en: "There are certain decisions I made that you will never understand."

translation.en: "But that's all in the past now."
translation.zh: 但那都是过去的事了

translation.en: "Life can be cruel."

translation.en: "What made me great at some things made me lousy at others."

translation.en: "I wish I could say that some good came from what I did."

translation.en: "In truth,
translation.zh: 事实上

translation.en: I left the world a more dangerous place."

translation.en: -Bedtime, now! -[squealing]

translation.en: -Okay. -[laughs] My pillow! [sighs] Okay, lay down.

translation.en: Oh, it's just the wind, baby. Don't be scared.

translation.en: -I'm not scared. -Okay.

translation.zh: -好的-你害怕吗？ -你今晚想跟我睡吗？-如果你想 我就跟你睡

translation.en: -Oh, if you need me to, I will. -I think I do.
translation.zh: -你今晚想跟我睡吗？-如果你想 我就跟你睡 我想让你跟我睡

translation.en: Oh shit.

translation.en: Shit, shit, shit, shit!

translation.en: -Vee… -[chuckles]

translation.en: -Watch your mouth. -Shit!

translation.en: -Hey! -[lamp plays tune] Do not test my patience, little lady. [laughing]

translation.en: I'm just gonna go flip the breaker.
translation.zh: 我要去把断电器打上去

translation.en: I'll be right back, okay?

translation.en: Mommy?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: Is that you?
translation.zh: 是你吗？

translation.en: Chris!
translation.zh: 克里斯！

translation.en: Oh! Vee!
translation.zh: 小薇！

translation.en: [gasping] No! Vee!
translation.zh: 不！小薇！

translation.en: Vee!
translation.zh: 小薇！

translation.en: Vee! Vee! Vee! Vee? Vee!
translation.zh: 小薇！

translation.en: -Where's your phone? -What the hell?
translation.zh: -电话呢？-搞什么鬼？

translation.en: Where's your goddamn phone? I gotta call the sheriff.

translation.en: -[gasps] God damn it! Fuck! -[Lou] Slow down. What happened?

translation.en: -[gasps] Vee's gone. -What, you let her wander off again?
translation.zh: 小薇不见了 你又让她跑开了？她走不了多远

translation.en: -Her father took her. -Her father?

translation.en: He's… he's here. How the hell is he here?

translation.en: Hold on. You saw him?
translation.zh: 等等 你看到他了吗？

translation.en: No. I…
translation.zh: 没有 我…

translation.en: He… he's supposed to be dead, but he found us.

translation.en: I-- I thought we were free of him.
translation.zh: 我以为摆脱他了

translation.en: -He killed Chris. -Jesus Christ.

translation.en: Where are your keys? The car won't start. I gotta get to the sheriff.

translation.en: -[Lou] I'll drive. -Okay.

translation.en: Hm.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: -[engine coughing] -No, no, no, no, no! Come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Run!

translation.en: What?

translation.en: -[melody plays] -[Lou] Down!

translation.en: Ho-- how did you know it was gonna blow up?

translation.en: Bombs tend to.

translation.en: -[whining] -Sorry about that, buddy. Turns out I'm not done yet.

translation.en: A bomb? It means he's been plannin' this, Lou.

translation.en: We gotta get more help. We need to get to the sheriff.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多支援 我们得去找警长

translation.en: Can't get to him. No cars. Phones are down.
translation.zh: 没法去找他 没有车 电话也坏了

translation.en: We're ten miles outside of town.
translation.zh: 我们在城外十几公里

translation.en: Your kid's gettin' further away by the second.
translation.zh: 每耽误一秒你孩子就走远一步 我得去追踪他们

translation.en: -I have to track 'em. -What?
translation.zh: 每耽误一秒你孩子就走远一步 我得去追踪他们 什么？

translation.en: Track 'em? You?
translation.zh: 你追踪他们？

translation.en: [Lou] Get batteries. Kitchen.
translation.zh: 去拿电池 在厨房

translation.en: You don't understand. Philip was a Green Beret.
translation.zh: 你不了解情况 菲利普以前当过兵

translation.en: Wanted for some terrible shit that he did in Central America.
translation.zh: 他在中美洲做了可怕的事因此还被通缉了

translation.en: War crimes kind of shit.
translation.zh: 是战争罪什么的

translation.en: I saw the court transcripts. He was torturing hostages for fun.
translation.zh: 我看了法庭手稿 他折磨俘虏来作乐

translation.en: He's highly trained. An explosives expert. Well, we're no match for him, Lou.
translation.zh: 他训练有素 是个炸弹专家妈的 我们可不是他的对手

translation.en: We need professional help. You and the dog ain't gonna cut it.
translation.zh: 我们需要专业的救援光凭你和你家狗是不行的

translation.en: Did he take anything from your trailer?
translation.zh: 他从你的拖车里拿走了什么吗？

translation.en: [mother] Her-- her favorite stuffy, Mr. Hippo.
translation.zh: 拿走了小薇最喜欢的河马先生玩偶 还有一条毯子

translation.en: -And a-- a blanket. -He wants her comfortable.
translation.zh: 拿走了小薇最喜欢的河马先生玩偶 还有一条毯子 他想让她舒服一点

translation.en: He wants her quiet.
translation.zh: 他只想让她保持安静

translation.en: Renovations.
translation.zh: 正在翻修

translation.en: When they tried to arrest him, he blew his apartment up.
translation.zh: 警察试图逮捕他时他炸毁了自己的公寓

translation.en: They sent a death certificate. How the hell could he still be alive?
translation.zh: 警察也发了死亡证明他怎么可能还活着？

translation.en: [Lou] Halothane. Sleeping gas.
translation.zh: 氟烷 会让人昏睡的气体

translation.en: You're lucky it didn't knock you out.
translation.zh: 你没被迷晕 算你走运

translation.en: [Lou] He's pullin' her in somethin'.
translation.zh: 他用东西把她拉着走了

translation.en: If he gets her off the island, this will get a lot messier.
translation.zh: 他要是想带小薇离开岛事情就更复杂了

translation.en: Airport and ferry are closed.
translation.zh: 飞机场和渡轮都关了

translation.en: Private vessel. He's headed to the coast.
translation.zh: 要坐私人游艇 他就得去海岸

translation.en: He's got a head start. I gotta move fast.
translation.zh: 他有领先优势我得抓紧了 你待在这里

translation.en: Stay here. The storm clears, head into town.
translation.zh: 他有领先优势我得抓紧了 你待在这里 风暴过后就进城一见到有屋子 就进去打给警长

translation.en: First house you see, call the sheriff.
translation.zh: 风暴过后就进城一见到有屋子 就进去打给警长

translation.en: -Hey, where are you goin'? -To find my child.
translation.zh: -喂 你要去哪里？-去找我的孩子

translation.en: You don't know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 你不知道自己在做什么

translation.en: If you slow me down, I will leave you behind.
translation.zh: 如果你拖慢我的速度我就把你扔下不管

translation.en: Jax. Right on.
translation.zh: 贾克斯 继续走

translation.en: [man] You can't see shit.
translation.zh: 什么都看不到

translation.en: We're close. We're clearing the ridge. We'll be there shortly.
translation.zh: 我们很接近了 正在穿过山脊 我们马上就到

translation.en: -[thump] -[Philip] Fuckin' idiots.
translation.zh: 我们马上就到 该死的一群白痴

translation.en: No. No, no, no. It's okay.
translation.zh: 不 没关系

translation.en: I know it's been a while.
translation.zh: 我知道好久没见了

translation.en: Maybe this'll jog your memory.
translation.zh: 也许这能唤起你的记忆

translation.en: Here's the church…
translation.zh: 这个是教堂

translation.en: Here's the steeple…
translation.zh: 这是尖顶

translation.en: Open it up and…
translation.zh: 把它打开 然后是…

translation.en: It's you.
translation.zh: 是你

translation.en: Yes, it is. It's-- it's me.
translation.zh: 对 是的 是我

translation.en: It's me, sweetie.
translation.zh: 是我 宝贝

translation.en: You came back from your adventure.
translation.zh: 你探完险回来了

translation.en: I sure did.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: And… and I even brought you a present.
translation.zh: 我还给你带了礼物呢

translation.en: Is it part of the treasure?
translation.zh: 是在宝藏堆里找到的吗？

translation.en: Uh, treasure? Yeah!
translation.zh: 宝藏？对

translation.en: Yeah, it sure is.
translation.zh: 没错 当然是了

translation.en: And… you and I are gonna go on our own adventure together.
translation.zh: 而且你和我要一起去一趟属于我们的探险

translation.en: Where's Mo-- Where's Mommy? Is she coming with us?
translation.zh: 妈妈在哪儿？她跟我们一起去吗？

translation.en: Yeah, of course she is. Of course she is.
translation.zh: 对 她当然要去

translation.en: I left her a note and some clues to follow us,
translation.zh: 我给她留了纸条和提示 让她跟上来

translation.en: and she's gonna meet up with us after, okay?
translation.zh: 她晚点会跟我们汇合的 好吗？

translation.en: Uh-- Whoa.
translation.zh: 别急嘛！

translation.en: What do you say?
translation.zh: 你要说什么？

translation.en: Thank you, Daddy.
translation.zh: 谢谢 爸爸

translation.en: -Okay. -[man on radio] Do you copy?
translation.zh: 好的 能收到吗？

translation.en: Come on. Get on radio.
translation.zh: 收到 快上线 能听到吗？

translation.en: -Do you copy? -All right, I've gotta do one more thing.
translation.zh: 好吧 我还有一件事要处理

translation.en: And then you and I are gonna start our adventure together.
translation.zh: 然后你就要和我一起开始探险了

translation.en: See, you put these on… All right, like that.
translation.zh: 所以你戴上这个 好了 就是这样

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: [Lou] Here.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: [mother] You see anything?
translation.zh: 你看到什么了吗？

translation.en: -[Lou] You know them? -Tony and Gerry. They served with Philip.
translation.zh: -你认识他们？-托尼和格里 是菲利普的战友

translation.en: They're just as vicious as he is. Come on.
translation.zh: -他们就跟菲利普一样狠毒-来吧

translation.en: Stay down. Your jacket might as well have a target painted on it.
translation.zh: 趴下别动 你的外套就是一个活靶子

translation.en: -[sighs] -We wait.
translation.zh: 我们等着

translation.en: Suppose this is just a distraction? Buying him more time to get away with Vee.
translation.zh: 万一这只是声东击西呢？ 好争取更多时间让他带着小薇离开他就喜欢搞这种鬼把戏

translation.en: It's the kind of game he likes to play.
translation.zh: 好争取更多时间让他带着小薇离开他就喜欢搞这种鬼把戏

translation.en: Danglin' somethin' shiny in front of you,
translation.zh: 拿闪亮的东西在你面前晃

translation.en: and you don't notice when he's about to bash you over your goddamn head.
translation.zh: 然后他趁你不备 给你脑袋一闷棍

translation.en: [grunts] Do you know how to use this?
translation.zh: 你会用枪吗？

translation.en: Mmm, yeah. [grunts]
translation.zh: 我会 我离开他之后去上课学过

translation.en: -I took lessons after I left him. -All right, I'm gonna go have a look.
translation.zh: 我会 我离开他之后去上课学过 好的 我得去看一下

translation.en: If anybody gets too close, use this.
translation.zh: 如果有人离得太近 就用这个

translation.en: Go for the eyes. A man can't kill what he can't see.
translation.zh: 直接戳眼睛 眼瞎的人没法要你的命

translation.en: -How do you know all this? -Girl Scouts.
translation.zh: -你在哪里学的这些东西？-女童子军

translation.en: Jax. Stay.
translation.zh: 贾克斯 待着别动

translation.en: [man 1] All right, no one's gonna follow him in this shit.
translation.zh: 这种鬼天气 没人想跟着他过来

translation.en: I'm telling you, this feels like another one of Philip's fucked-up games.
translation.zh: 感觉这又是一次菲利普的蹩脚游戏

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Oh, excuse me. I'm completely turned around out here. I--
translation.zh: 不好意思 我把这里都转了个遍

translation.en: I… I was looking for my dog. The poor little guy--
translation.zh: 我在找我家的狗 可怜的小家伙…

translation.en: I haven't seen any dogs.
translation.zh: -我没看到狗-好吧

translation.en: Okay. Do… do you have a phone I could use?
translation.zh: -我没看到狗-好吧 你有电话可以借给我用吗？我只想…

translation.en: -I just want-- -Are you alone?
translation.zh: 就你一个人？

translation.en: Unfortunately. Um…
translation.zh: 很不幸 是的

translation.en: Look, I-- I don't think I can make it the three hours back home, but…
translation.zh: 听我说 我感觉自己没法再撑三个小时走路回家了

translation.en: if I could just rest and get my… my bearings?
translation.zh: 不过 要是能歇歇脚就好了

translation.en: Christ.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -Okay. Just two minutes. -Oh!
translation.zh: 好吧 只能待两分钟

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: Oh shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: [Lou] Oh, bless your heart.
translation.zh: 多谢你的善心

translation.en: Oh, good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好啊

translation.en: She lost her dog, man. She's soaked.
translation.zh: 她的狗跑丢了 被雨淋湿了

translation.en: Just need to get my blood movin' again.
translation.zh: 只要让我的血液循环起来就好

translation.en: My goodness. Quite a storm out there.
translation.zh: 天啊 外面的风暴真是厉害

translation.en: -Oh. -[man 2] What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Oh, sorry, I'm-- I'm Martha. Flemming.
translation.zh: 哦 抱歉 我叫玛莎 弗莱明

translation.en: But you might know my husband, Gordon.
translation.zh: 但你们可能认识我丈夫他上班的地方在…

translation.en: -He works at the-- -I don't.
translation.zh: 但你们可能认识我丈夫他上班的地方在… 不认识

translation.en: Here. Why don't you grab a seat?
translation.zh: 来 坐一下吧

translation.en: -Give those cold feet a break. -They sure could use it.
translation.zh: -让冰冷的脚休息一下-那就太好了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [whispers] Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: -Oof… -So… been on this island long?
translation.zh: 你在岛上待了很久吗？

translation.en: -Oh, 32 years. -I don't get the appeal.
translation.zh: 32年了 不知道这有什么好的

translation.en: It's a pain in the ass to get to. -Weather's shit. [chuckles] -[sighs]
translation.zh: 过来一趟也麻烦 天气又糟糕

translation.en: It's an acquired taste. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 得慢慢习惯才行

translation.en: I love it, though.
translation.zh: 我就很喜欢这里

translation.en: -Good place to hide, I reckon. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 我倒觉得是个藏身的好地方

translation.en: Come on, Tony, relax. She's just an old lady.
translation.zh: 得了吧 托尼 放松点 她只是个老太

translation.en: [breathing shakily] The soup smells so good.
translation.zh: 这汤闻着好香啊

translation.en: So nice and warm in here.
translation.zh: 这里真舒服 又暖和

translation.en: That must be my Jax.
translation.zh: 那一定是我家贾克斯

translation.en: Sit down, Martha.
translation.zh: 坐下 玛莎

translation.en: Where is he taking her?
translation.zh: 他要带她去哪里？

translation.en: Where…
translation.zh: 快说

translation.en: …is he taking her?
translation.zh: 他要带她去哪里？

translation.en: [groans] Eagle Bay.
translation.zh: 老鹰湾

translation.en: And then where?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: [Tony] I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I swear. That's all I know.
translation.zh: 我发誓 我只知道这些

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
translation.zh: 你要开枪打我吗？

translation.en: Things, uh…
translation.zh: 事态

translation.en: escalated.
translation.zh: 更严峻了

translation.en: [sighs] Jax. What'd I tell you about that?
translation.zh: 贾克斯 我是怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: Gerry, he say anything about Vee before you killed him?
translation.zh: 在你杀格里之前他说了关于小薇的线索吗？

translation.en: Not a word.
translation.zh: 一个字都没说

translation.en: Here. Take this outside. Go through it.
translation.zh: 给你 把这个拿出去 仔细翻一下

translation.en: Hello? Come on!
translation.zh: 喂？拜托！

translation.en: Turn that thing off.
translation.zh: 把那玩意儿关掉

translation.en: -We might be able to reach the sheriff. -Not in this weather.
translation.zh: -我们也许能联系到警长-这种天气就别指望了

translation.en: More likely it'll tip off Philip.
translation.zh: 更有可能会引起菲利普的注意

translation.en: -What channel would the emergency-- -Don't argue with me. Leave it.
translation.zh: -哪个频道才是…-别跟我争辩 快放下

translation.en: Unbelievable.
translation.zh: 难以置信

translation.en: You know, I was in the Girl Scouts, too.
translation.zh: 你知道 我也参加过女童子军

translation.en: Got my archery badge, pen pal, first aid.
translation.zh: 我拿到了射箭徽章交到了笔友 学会了急救

translation.en: There wasn't one for hand-to-hand combat or murder with household objects.
translation.zh: 但是他们没教过徒手搏击或者拿家用物品来杀人

translation.en: Really? Must've just been my troop, then.
translation.zh: 是吗？那肯定是我服役的时候学的

translation.en: What branch of the military were you in?
translation.zh: 你隶属哪支部队？

translation.en: CIA.
translation.zh: 中情局

translation.en: 26 years in the field.
translation.zh: 做了26年的外勤

translation.en: A spy?
translation.zh: 间谍？

translation.en: -Wouldn't have guessed that. -Be a shit spy if you did.
translation.zh: -还真没想到-要是被你猜到 我这特务就太菜了

translation.en: -Come on, Jax. -[whines]
translation.zh: 来吧 贾克斯

translation.en: -[Vee] Daddy? -[Philip] Yeah!
translation.zh: 爸爸？ 我在呢！

translation.en: I need to pee.
translation.zh: 我要尿尿

translation.en: -[Philip] Can-- can you hold it? -[Vee] Nuh-uh.
translation.zh: 你能忍一忍吗？ 忍不住了

translation.en: -♪ That guide me towards salvation… ♪ -[Philip] Okay. Short break.
translation.zh: 好吧 稍微歇一会儿

translation.en: -Hello? -[static]
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: Hello, hello. Is anyone there?
translation.zh: 喂 有人在吗？

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们快走！

translation.en: [Philip] Okay, come on, Vee.
translation.zh: 好了 快点 小薇！

translation.en: Vee?
translation.zh: 小薇！

translation.en: Vee!
translation.zh: 小薇！

translation.en: Let me see?
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: Yeah. No, he's got-- he's got a bad wing, Vee.
translation.zh: 是的 它的翅膀受伤了 小薇

translation.en: Yeah. You know…
translation.zh: 对 你要知道

translation.en: sometimes, in nature, when a…
translation.zh: 有时候在大自然里

translation.en: creature's damaged…
translation.zh: 当一个生物受伤了

translation.en: there's nothing you can do to save them.
translation.zh: 其实你也救不了它

translation.en: It's almost like they were meant to die.
translation.zh: 就好像它注定要死亡

translation.en: [Vee] But maybe he's just tired.
translation.zh: 但也许它只是累了

translation.en: Maybe. Yeah.
translation.zh: 也许吧 是的

translation.en: Uh… Here. We'll put him right up here.
translation.zh: 来 我把它放到这上面

translation.en: -All right. Come on. -Wait, I haven't peed yet.
translation.zh: -好了 来吧-等等 我还没尿尿呢

translation.en: Come on, Vee. Now!
translation.zh: 快点 小薇 得走了！

translation.en: [Lou] Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: -Fuck. -What's hurtin'?
translation.zh: -操-哪里疼？

translation.en: Nothin'.
translation.zh: 不疼

translation.en: Come on. We gotta keep movin'.
translation.zh: 快点 我们得继续走

translation.en: -[music stops] -[Philip] Fucking kidding me! Damn it. Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的 开什么玩笑！见鬼 我操！

translation.en: Hi. We have to walk now, okay?
translation.zh: 嗨 得下来自己走了 好吗？

translation.en: -I need a break. -Huh?
translation.zh: -我需要休息一下-啊？

translation.en: I need a break to warm up.
translation.zh: 我需要休息 暖暖身子

translation.en: No time, Lou.
translation.zh: 没时间了 卢

translation.en: He takes breaks too. I can tell by the tracks. Come on.
translation.zh: 他也会休息从他留下的踪迹就看得出来 来吧

translation.en: [Lou] Oh, God damn it!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: [sighs] Oh shit.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: I'm not too cold.
translation.zh: 我不觉得太冷

translation.en: You?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: Shit. [gasps]
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: [Lou] You walked a long way on that. You should've said somethin'.
translation.zh: 你带伤走了这么久 早该告诉我才对

translation.en: And give you an excuse to abandon me?
translation.zh: 好让你抛下我不管？

translation.en: Is that for me? No.
translation.zh: -那是给我的吗？-不是

translation.en: Well, can I have some?
translation.zh: 能给我一点吗？

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: And yet you stayed.
translation.zh: 你却还是留下了

translation.en: Well, should've done somethin'.
translation.zh: 你早就该做点什么了

translation.en: [mother] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Thanks, Lou. That's… very helpful.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 卢 你这番话很有帮助

translation.en: Just saying you could've left him sooner.
translation.zh: 我是说你应该早点离开他

translation.en: What is it you know about being with someone like him?
translation.zh: 你知道跟他这样的人在一起是怎样的吗？

translation.en: So maybe don't tell me what I should have done.
translation.zh: 所以或许不要当事后诸葛

translation.en: I didn't recognize who I was with him.
translation.zh: 我都不认得跟他在一起时的自己

translation.en: I actually felt I could fix him.
translation.zh: 其实 我以为我可以治愈他

translation.en: You know, when we met, he was loving, he was caring…
translation.zh: 你知道 我们最初认识时 他很爱我 他很在乎我 但他的心支离破碎

translation.en: But so broken.
translation.zh: 他很在乎我 但他的心支离破碎

translation.en: For so long, I thought… thought it was all me.
translation.zh: 过去这么久了我还以为都是我一个人的错

translation.en: I thought…
translation.zh: 我以为…

translation.en: [sighs] "Why am I failing him? Why isn't my love enough?"
translation.zh: 为什么我会让他失望？ 为什么我的爱还不够？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: That son of a bitch is a monster.
translation.zh: 那个混蛋是个怪物

translation.en: Whatever the hell made him this way.
translation.zh: 不管是什么炼狱把他折磨成这副模样

translation.en: There ain't no amount of love in this entire world
translation.zh: 反正就算用尽全世界的爱

translation.en: that's gonna be able to save that man.
translation.zh: 都没法拯救他这种人

translation.en: He ever hurt Vee?
translation.zh: 他伤害过小薇吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: When he would get into his moods,
translation.zh: 每当他大发脾气的时候

translation.en: I'd whisper to her, "Game on,"
translation.zh: 我就跟小薇小声说：“游戏开始”

translation.en: and she'd run and hide.
translation.zh: 然后她就会跑去躲起来

translation.en: Actually made it into a… a goddamn game.
translation.zh: 我居然把它变成了一个该死的游戏

translation.en: How pathetic is that?
translation.zh: 你说这有多可悲？

translation.en: [sniffling] He always said, if I took Vee away, he'd kill us both.
translation.zh: 他总是说 如果我带走小薇他就会杀了我们两个

translation.en: Go on… Tell me what I should've done.
translation.zh: 所以你说吧 我当时该怎么办？

translation.en: I guess we've all been through things other people will never understand.
translation.zh: 我想我俩都经历了别人无法理解的事

translation.en: Hannah?
translation.zh: 汉娜

translation.en: We'll get her back.
translation.zh: 我们会把她救回来的

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [Hannah murmurs] Oh, shit, shit, shit, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -[panting] -Slow and steady.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 保持平稳

translation.en: Home, Jax.
translation.zh: 回家吧 贾克斯

translation.en: No arguments. Home. Now!
translation.zh: 不准跟我争辩 回家！快去！

translation.en: Oh shit.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: How the hell did he do this with Vee?
translation.zh: 他到底是怎么带着小薇一起过去的？

translation.en: Gotta climb around it. Oh shit.
translation.zh: -得爬过去才行-该死

translation.en: -Whoa! -[whimpers]
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: -Aah! -Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: [Lou] I got you.
translation.zh: 我扶着你

translation.en: [Lou] Good job.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: [Lou] Shit.
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: [groans] Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: [grunts] Not now. God damn it.
translation.zh: 真会挑时候 妈的！

translation.en: -Lou, what's the matter? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -卢 你怎么了？-没什么

translation.en: -[gasps] -Lou! [screams]
translation.zh: 卢！

translation.en: Oh God.
translation.zh: 天啊 我的天 卢 快醒醒

translation.en: Lou, wake up. Lou.
translation.zh: 天啊 我的天 卢 快醒醒 卢

translation.en: -Oh… -[coughs]
translation.zh: 卢

translation.en: -[yells] -Oh, thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地

translation.en: Let me help you up. -[grunts] Get off me. -[gasps]
translation.zh: -我扶你起来-别碰我！

translation.en: I can help you if you just let me.
translation.zh: 你让我扶你起来就好了嘛

translation.en: [Lou] I don't need your help.
translation.zh: 不需要你帮我

translation.en: -[crack] -[groans] Oh, fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: [grunts] Get up. We just lost an hour on him.
translation.zh: 起来 耽误了一小时 得追上他

translation.en: Hey, I told you to leave that behind.
translation.zh: 喂 我叫你不要带上这玩意儿

translation.en: Storm's passed. I'm gonna climb up to that hilltop.
translation.zh: 风暴过去了我要爬上那个山顶 试着连接

translation.en: -Try to connect. -There's no time.
translation.zh: 风暴过去了我要爬上那个山顶 试着连接 没时间了

translation.en: God damn it. Can you stop bein' so stubborn? We need help.
translation.zh: 见鬼 你别那么固执好吗？我们需要帮助

translation.en: -There is no one who can help us. -[sighs] Shit.
translation.zh: 没人能帮我们我是你的唯一希望 现在继续走吧

translation.en: -I'm all you've got. Now keep movin'. -[sighs] Why are you helpin' me, Lou?
translation.zh: 没人能帮我们我是你的唯一希望 现在继续走吧 -你为什么要帮我 卢？-老鹰湾就在前面

translation.en: -Huh? -Eagle Bay's just ahead.
translation.zh: -你为什么要帮我 卢？-老鹰湾就在前面

translation.en: -Don't slow me down. -God damn it.
translation.zh: -别拖慢我的速度-见鬼

translation.en: [sighs] We missed them.
translation.zh: 我们没赶上他们

translation.en: No one's comin' or goin' in water this rough.
translation.zh: 海浪这么汹涌 人员无法进出

translation.en: -[Hannah] Then what's his plan? -Over here.
translation.zh: 那他打算怎么办？ 这边

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Hannah] Vee!
translation.zh: 小薇！

translation.en: Vee!
translation.zh: 小薇！

translation.en: -Where did you take her? -Stop.
translation.zh: -你把她带到哪里去了？-别喊了！

translation.en: -[muffled sobs] -He's fucking with you.
translation.zh: 他这是在捉弄你

translation.en: We can do this all day.
translation.zh: 我们可以就这样耗一天

translation.en: [Lou] Maybe you're right. Maybe we do need help.
translation.zh: 也许你说得对我们可能确实需要帮助

translation.en: Go back to that hill.
translation.zh: 你回到山里去

translation.en: See if you can raise Rankin. Emergency services are channel 16.
translation.zh: 看看你能不能联系上兰金紧急服务在第16频道

translation.en: Meet me back here when you're done.
translation.zh: 联系到了之后回来这里跟我汇合

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 你打算怎么办？

translation.en: [Lou] I need to rest. [gasping] Go on.
translation.zh: 我得休息一下 去吧

translation.en: Hey, hold up.
translation.zh: 嘿 等一下

translation.en: Try not to blow your brains out.
translation.zh: 可别一枪崩了自己的脑袋

translation.en: There we are. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Frozen in time.
translation.zh: 冻结在时间里

translation.en: Together forever.
translation.zh: 永远和你在一起

translation.en: Wanna do another one?
translation.zh: 还想再印一个吗？

translation.en: Did you know…
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: that there are handprints like these in caves all over the world?
translation.zh: 世界各地的山洞里都有像这样的手印

translation.en: And long after you and Mommy and I are all dead…
translation.zh: 等你和妈妈还有我都死了很久之后

translation.en: these handprints are still gonna be here.
translation.zh: 这些手印还会在这里

translation.en: [groans] Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: [Hannah, breaking up] Hello? Can anyone hear me? Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？有人能听到吗？

translation.en: Can anybody hear me?
translation.zh: 有人听到吗？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Hello, anybody?
translation.zh: 你好 有人吗？该死

translation.en: -God damn it. -This is Sheriff Rankin.
translation.zh: 你好 有人吗？该死 我是兰金警长 你是谁？完毕

translation.en: -[gasps] -Who is this? Over.
translation.zh: 我是兰金警长 你是谁？完毕

translation.en: Sheriff! [laughs] Sheriff Rankin.
translation.zh: 警长！兰金警长

translation.en: Oh God. Thank God. This is-- this is Hannah Dawson.
translation.zh: 天啊 谢天谢地 我是汉娜道森

translation.en: [breaking up] …kidnapped. Kidnapped?
translation.zh: -…被绑架了-绑架？

translation.en: Hannah, can you hear me? Can you repeat that, please?
translation.zh: 汉娜 你能听到我说话吗？你能重复一遍吗？

translation.en: Uh-- Okay. [gasps] My daughter was kidnapped by her father.
translation.zh: 好吧 我女儿被她父亲绑架了

translation.en: Lou Adell is with me… Hannah, can you please confirm?
translation.zh: -卢阿德尔和我在一起-汉娜 你能确认情况吗？

translation.en: [breaking up] Hannah Dawson? Can you hear me? What?
translation.zh: -汉娜道森 你能听到吗？-什么？

translation.en: Say that… say that again?
translation.zh: 你再说一次好吗？

translation.en: -Come on, come on, come on. -[static]
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Sheriff?
translation.zh: 警长？

translation.en: [sighs] Oh fuck. Okay…
translation.zh: 该死 好吧

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: Torres, come in.
translation.zh: 呼叫托瑞斯

translation.en: -[Torres] Go, Sheriff. -Listen, we got a situation.
translation.zh: -警长 请讲-听着 我们有情况

translation.en: This is gonna sound a bit crazy,
translation.zh: 听起来难以置信

translation.en: but I think Hannah Dawson's daughter has been kidnapped by… by her father.
translation.zh: 但是我想汉娜道森的女儿被她父亲绑架了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Listen, let's put it on the wire, right away,
translation.zh: 听着 我们马上把信息发布出去

translation.en: in case she's taken off the island.
translation.zh: 以防女孩被带离这座岛

translation.en: Okay? Hannah and Vee Dawson and Lou Adell. I think she mentioned Lou.
translation.zh: 好吧？汉娜道森 薇道森和卢阿德尔她好像也提到了卢

translation.en: The guns.
translation.zh: 放下枪

translation.en: Slowly.
translation.zh: 慢点

translation.en: Hello, Philip.
translation.zh: 你好 菲利普

translation.en: Don't worry about her.
translation.zh: 别担心她

translation.en: I've made sure she'll sleep through this.
translation.zh: 我已经确保她会保持昏睡

translation.en: Just tell me one thing. And be honest here.
translation.zh: 告诉我一件事 老实回答

translation.en: Why'd you sell me out?
translation.zh: 你为什么要出卖我？

translation.en: I knew you'd track down Hannah and Vee sooner or later.
translation.zh: 我知道你迟早会找到汉娜和小薇

translation.en: I wasn't gonna be able to protect them forever.
translation.zh: 我无法永远保护她们

translation.en: Protect them? [scoffs] All of this is happening because of you.
translation.zh: 保护她们？这一切都是因你而起

translation.en: Okay? And Hannah may be too naive to-- to see it, but I don't.
translation.zh: 不是吗？汉娜可能太天真了她没想明白 但是我不傻

translation.en: Hannah doesn't know who I am.
translation.zh: 汉娜不知道我是谁

translation.en: You still can't even admit I'm your son.
translation.zh: 你连承认我是你儿子都还做不到

translation.en: So what's the plan, Philip? Why the elaborate chase?
translation.zh: 菲利普 你打算做什么？为什么要这样你追我赶？

translation.en: Why let us track you? You don't wanna hurt your kid.
translation.zh: 为什么要让我们追踪你？你并不想伤害你的孩子

translation.en: Did you know that Vee is the same age as I was when those-- those men took me?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？那些人把我掳走时我年纪就跟小薇一样

translation.en: Yeah, but they weren't as nice as, uh… as I'm being to her.
translation.zh: 是的 但他们就没有像我现在这样 对她这么温柔了

translation.en: Can you appreciate that? The symmetry of that?
translation.zh: 这样的相似程度 你不觉得很巧吗？

translation.en: I thought my mommy was comin' back to save me, too.
translation.zh: 我以为我妈妈也会回来救我

translation.en: It was a trap. If I'd tried to save you, they would have had us both.
translation.zh: 那是个陷阱要是我来救你的话 我俩都会被抓

translation.en: Bullshit. You wanted to maintain your cover.
translation.zh: 胡说 你只想保护自己的卧底身份

translation.en: I was a pawn for your mission. Nothin' else.
translation.zh: 我只是你执行任务的一枚棋子而已

translation.en: -I had you rescued. I got you out of Iran. -Then why didn't you come back with me?
translation.zh: 我救了你 我把你从伊朗救了出来 那你怎么不跟我一起回来？原因很简单

translation.en: Here's why.
translation.zh: 那你怎么不跟我一起回来？原因很简单

translation.en: Because you chose the fucking CIA over your own child.
translation.zh: 因为你他妈的选择了中情局而不是选择自己的孩子

translation.en: Yeah, how'd that work out for you? Hmm?
translation.zh: 后来事情怎么样？

translation.en: I mean, did you guys fuck up anything worse than you fucked up Iran?
translation.zh: 伊朗被你们搞得一团糟你们还做过比这更糟糕的事吗？

translation.en: And then you steal my wife and-- and my kid--
translation.zh: 然后 你偷走了我的妻子和孩子…

translation.en: Hannah and Vee had nothing to do with my mistakes. Leave them out of this.
translation.zh: 她们跟我犯的错无关 别牵扯上她们

translation.en: Oh, spare me the fuckin' morality lesson.
translation.zh: 你就别给我上思想道德课了

translation.en: You gave up that right a long time ago.
translation.zh: 你早就放弃了这个权利

translation.en: It's not too late.
translation.zh: 现在还不迟

translation.en: You move, I'mma put a bullet in you.
translation.zh: 你敢动一下 我就给你一枪

translation.en: It's not too late.
translation.zh: 现在还不迟

translation.en: Leave Vee with me and go.
translation.zh: 把小薇留给我 然后你走吧

translation.en: I'll throw them off your trail.
translation.zh: 我会把她们从你的踪迹中抹去

translation.en: Philip, listen to me.
translation.zh: 菲利普 听我说

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: I didn't protect you when you were a kid. So let me do it now.
translation.zh: 你小时候我没保护好你现在就让我做弥补吧

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: What, you wanna kill me?
translation.zh: 怎么 你想杀我？

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 动手吧

translation.en: Before I knew you took Vee last night, I had my rifle pressed against my head.
translation.zh: 你昨晚带走小薇时我正拿着来复枪抵着自己脑袋

translation.en: I'm not afraid to go.
translation.zh: 我不怕死

translation.en: [mumbles] You just can't stop messin' with my head, can't you?
translation.zh: 你别总是打乱我的思绪 好吗？

translation.en: Kid, I wouldn't even know where to start.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道从何讲起

translation.en: The minute I heard you blew yourself up, I knew it was time.
translation.zh: 我知道你把自己炸死了之后我就知道时机到了

translation.en: I thought Hannah and Vee were safe. My mission was complete.
translation.zh: 我以为汉娜和小薇会很安全我的任务已经完成了

translation.en: But you tricked me there, didn't you?
translation.zh: 但你欺骗了我

translation.en: You always were smarter than me.
translation.zh: 你向来都比我聪明

translation.en: Beat my ass at chess when you were five years old.
translation.zh: 你五岁时下象棋就比我厉害很多

translation.en: Remember that?
translation.zh: 记得吗？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我记得

translation.en: Oh, Philip.
translation.zh: 哦 菲利普

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？

translation.en: For once, we're playin' my game.
translation.zh: 这次要按我的游戏规则来玩

translation.en: It's time to end this legacy.
translation.zh: 是时候做个了结了

translation.en: Put this whole family out of its misery.
translation.zh: 好让这一家子都摆脱痛苦

translation.en: Philip, you're her father.
translation.zh: 菲利普 你是她爸爸

translation.en: And you're my mother.
translation.zh: 你也是我妈妈啊

translation.en: Mom! Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: We'll be waiting for you at the lighthouse.
translation.zh: 我们会在灯塔等你

translation.en: Make sure you bring Hannah.
translation.zh: 一定要带汉娜一起来

translation.en: Don't take too long.
translation.zh: 别让我们久等

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: [man on radio] Just checking in on ya. How are you doing out there?
translation.zh: 只是想问问你情况怎么样？

translation.en: -Talk to me, Deputy. -Still no hits on the APBs.
translation.zh: 副警长 进展如何？ 在全境通缉布告里没找到匹配

translation.en: I notified ATF about the bomb in the truck and the coroner about the body.
translation.zh: 已把卡车上的炸弹告知了交通运输部跟验尸官汇报了尸体情况

translation.en: They're sending teams when the weather lets up.
translation.zh: 等天气好转 他们就会派队伍过来

translation.en: Orcas Island Sheriff's Department.
translation.zh: 奥卡斯岛警察局

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的 长官

translation.en: Sheriff, it's the federal marshals.
translation.zh: 警长 是联邦执法官

translation.en: -This is Rankin. Who's this? -Sheriff, Dominick Crown here.
translation.zh: 我是兰金 你是哪位？ 警长 我是多米尼克科朗你收到传真了吗？

translation.en: Did you receive our facsimile transmission?
translation.zh: 警长 我是多米尼克科朗你收到传真了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I got it right here.
translation.zh: 收到了 我正拿在手里

translation.en: We've seen the APB for the woman you know as Lou Adell.
translation.zh: 我们在全境通缉布告里看到了你们所说的卢阿德尔

translation.en: Is she a match for the person in that photo?
translation.zh: 她跟照片里的这个人相匹配吗？

translation.en: [Rankin] Yeah. Yeah, it sure looks like her.
translation.zh: 对 是啊 看起来像是她

translation.en: -How confident are you, Sheriff? -It's her.
translation.zh: -你能确信是她吗 警长？-就是她

translation.en: -[fax machine whirs] -And the second individual?
translation.zh: -你能确信是她吗 警长？-就是她 那第二个人呢？

translation.en: -[bleep] -[Rankin] Hang on one second.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Do you recognize him?
translation.zh: 你认得他吗？

translation.en: No. Are you telling me that this guy is involved?
translation.zh: 不认得 你是说这家伙也牵涉其中？

translation.en: Do you have any intel on the location of these individuals?
translation.zh: 你知道这些人所处的位置吗？

translation.en: -Are they together? -Well, I don't know if they're together.
translation.zh: -他们是不是在一起？-我不知道

translation.en: What I believe is that they're headed to Eagle Bay, on the west side of our island.
translation.zh: 我想他们要去老鹰湾 位于岛的西侧

translation.en: We need to make sure no civilians go anywhere near that location.
translation.zh: 我们必须确保没有平民前往那附近

translation.en: Set up roadblocks and cordon the area.
translation.zh: 设置路障 封锁该区域

translation.en: There's a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.zh: 还有个被绑架的小女孩她妈妈也在那里

translation.en: -Hold. -Excuse me?
translation.zh: -你等一会儿-什么？

translation.en: Asshole put me on hold. Unbelievable.
translation.zh: 这混蛋居然让我等着 难以置信

translation.en: Un-fuckin'-believable.
translation.zh: -简直难以置信-兰金警长？

translation.en: -[marshal] Sheriff Rankin? -Yeah, right here.
translation.zh: -简直难以置信-兰金警长？ 对 就是我

translation.en: The male fugitive is US Army Special Forces,
translation.zh: 那个男性逃犯是美国特种部队的

translation.en: convicted in the murder of numerous civilians.
translation.zh: 因多起谋杀平民案而被定罪

translation.en: The female is a high-priority target for the CIA.
translation.zh: 那个女性是中情局的重点通缉目标

translation.en: The CIA? Lou Adell?
translation.zh: 中情局？卢阿德尔？

translation.en: This investigation is now under the jurisdiction of the US Marshals.
translation.zh: 这项调查现在由美国执法官负责

translation.en: Lethal force has been authorized.
translation.zh: 已获授权使用致命武力

translation.en: Do not allow any approach to Eagle Bay.
translation.zh: 禁止任何人进入老鹰湾你们部门的人不准…

translation.en: -Not by your department, not-- -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.zh: 禁止任何人进入老鹰湾你们部门的人不准… 慢着！还有个被绑架的小女孩她妈妈也在那里

translation.en: There-- there is a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.zh: 慢着！还有个被绑架的小女孩她妈妈也在那里

translation.en: Stay out of our way, Sheriff.
translation.zh: 别干扰我们执行任务 警长

translation.en: [Hannah] Lou, sorry it took me so long.
translation.zh: 卢 抱歉 我来晚了

translation.en: I tried to get as high as I could, but…
translation.zh: 我试着尽量往高处爬 但是…

translation.en: -[groans] -Jesus. Oh shit.
translation.zh: 天啊 见鬼

translation.en: Oh God, oh God, oh God. Okay, wait, wait. Let me help. Let me help.
translation.zh: 天啊 好 等等 我来帮你

translation.en: -Did he do this? -[groans]
translation.zh: 是他干的吗？

translation.en: And Vee? Is she… is she all right?
translation.zh: 小薇呢？她没事吧？

translation.en: She's okay for now. He's taking her to the lighthouse.
translation.zh: 她暂时没事 他把她带去灯塔了

translation.en: -Okay, wait, wait, wait. -Wait. -Move your hand right now. -Okay…
translation.zh: -等等-把手移开

translation.en: Do it quick--
translation.zh: 动作要快

translation.en: -[groans] -Oh shit.
translation.zh: 该死！包扎好伤口

translation.en: -Pack the wound. -I'm coming. I'm coming. I'm coming.
translation.zh: 该死！包扎好伤口 我正在弄

translation.en: Fill it with gauze. As-- as much as you can.
translation.zh: 尽量用纱布填满它

translation.en: -Oh shit. -Come on, deeper.
translation.zh: -该死-来吧 深入一点 把伤口包紧了

translation.en: -Really pack it in. [grunts] -I'm trying.
translation.zh: -该死-来吧 深入一点 把伤口包紧了 我正在弄 天啊 卢很抱歉 我把你拉下这趟浑水

translation.en: -[groans] -Jesus, Lou. -I'm so sorry I dragged you into this. -[moans]
translation.zh: 我正在弄 天啊 卢很抱歉 我把你拉下这趟浑水

translation.en: Put your hand here. Right. Press down. Okay, good. I gotta-- I gotta grab some tape.
translation.zh: 把手放在这里 用力按 我去拿些胶布

translation.en: Hannah. Did you reach the sheriff?
translation.zh: 你联系上警长了吗？

translation.en: -Uh, I don't know. -Leave it.
translation.zh: -我也不确定-先别管了

translation.en: -[Hannah] Wait, uh-- -It's fine.
translation.zh: -等等-不用了

translation.en: I found those at the cabin. I meant to tell you.
translation.zh: 是我在小屋里找到的我原本想告诉你的

translation.en: You're lying.
translation.zh: 你在说谎

translation.en: This message isn't for me, is it?
translation.zh: 这个留言不是给我的 对吧？

translation.en: [sighs] None of them are.
translation.zh: 都不是给我的

translation.en: Say it.
translation.zh: 你说吧

translation.en: I need you to say it.
translation.zh: 我要你亲口说出来

translation.en: Say it!
translation.zh: 说啊

translation.en: He's… my son.
translation.zh: 他是我儿子

translation.en: When I was stationed in Iran, I had to get close to a very dangerous man.
translation.zh: 我之前驻扎在伊朗 当时我必须接近一个极度危险的人物

translation.en: -[gasps] -Very close.
translation.zh: 关系很亲密

translation.en: No, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不是吧？

translation.en: I kept the baby to keep my cover.
translation.zh: 我留着孩子是为了掩护我的卧底身份

translation.en: You mean… you mean Philip? The baby? You mean your son?
translation.zh: 你是说菲利普吗？你的孩子？你是说你的儿子？

translation.en: So what is this? Some game?
translation.zh: 所以是怎么回事？在玩游戏？

translation.en: You fucking with me? What, you tell him where we were, or…
translation.zh: 你在捉弄我吗？怎么 是你告诉他我们在这里的吗？

translation.en: -What-- what is this? -No. I wasn't helping him.
translation.zh: -不是-那是什么？ 我不是在帮他

translation.en: -I was helping you. You and Vee. -Stop lying to me.
translation.zh: -我在帮你和小薇-别再骗我了

translation.en: -Tell me the goddamn truth! -[yells]
translation.zh: 快他妈的告诉我真相！

translation.en: I got you to this island.
translation.zh: 是我引你到这座岛上来的

translation.en: Your old friend from college?
translation.zh: 你大学的老朋友

translation.en: The one who told you about the beautiful secluded place on Orcas Island with the cheap rent?
translation.zh: 那个人告诉你奥卡斯岛是个漂亮的世外桃源 房租又便宜

translation.en: I had her run into you on the street. [sighs]
translation.zh: 是我让她在街上假装偶遇你的

translation.en: I tried to stop him.
translation.zh: 我原本想阻止菲利普

translation.en: I blackmailed the CIA to force an investigation into what he did in El Salvador.
translation.zh: 于是我勒索中情局逼他们调查菲利普在萨尔瓦多的行为

translation.en: -You think you saved us? -I knew he'd track you eventually.
translation.zh: 你以为是你救了我们？ 我知道他最终会追踪到你

translation.en: You didn't save us. I got Vee away from him.
translation.zh: 你没有救我们 是我带着小薇离开了他

translation.en: I took care of her every goddamn day and made sure she was safe.
translation.zh: 我每天都照顾她 确保她的安全

translation.en: Now she's out there with him because of you.
translation.zh: 就因为你 现在害小薇落在了他手上

translation.en: You're no damn hero. You're a fucking coward.
translation.zh: 你根本不是英雄！你他妈的是个胆小鬼！

translation.en: -Wow. -All that rage that that man felt.
translation.zh: -这…-那个男人的所有愤怒

translation.en: All the rage inside of that man that he felt,
translation.zh: 他心里燃烧的全部怒火

translation.en: that he aimed towards me, is because of you.
translation.zh: 撒在我身上的怒气全都是你一手造成的！

translation.en: Not everybody is meant to be a mother.
translation.zh: 不是每个人都适合当母亲！

translation.en: Yeah, maybe not.
translation.zh: 是啊 也许吧

translation.en: But you could have been a little more human.
translation.zh: 但你原本可以更有人性

translation.en: You drove past our trailer every day.
translation.zh: 你每天都开车经过我们的拖车

translation.en: You drove past your own granddaughter, Lou.
translation.zh: 卢 你开车经过自己的孙女

translation.en: You didn't talk to her. You didn't speak to her.
translation.zh: 你都没跟她说话你一句话都没跟她说过

translation.en: You didn't look at her.
translation.zh: 你连看都没看她一眼

translation.en: What kind of person could do that to their own family?
translation.zh: 什么样的人才会这样对待自己家人？

translation.en: [grunts] Come on. We gotta keep moving.
translation.zh: 拜托 我们得继续走了

translation.en: There ain't no more "we."
translation.zh: 再也没有“我们”了

translation.en: Hannah, you don't know where they're going.
translation.zh: 汉娜 你不知道他们要去哪里

translation.en: You said the lighthouse. I'll follow the coastline.
translation.zh: 你说了去灯塔 我会沿着海岸走过去

translation.en: Not on your own. It's a trap.
translation.zh: 不要独自过去 这是陷阱

translation.en: -Please. There's one thing I'm good for. -Not anymore.
translation.zh: 求你了 至少这件事是我在行的 恐怕不是了

translation.en: You'll just slow me down.
translation.zh: 你只会拖慢我的速度

translation.en: [Philip screaming] Mama! Mama! Mama! Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: -Jax. -[barking]
translation.zh: 贾克斯

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Rankin] Lou!
translation.zh: 卢！

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Never thought I'd be excited to see you.
translation.zh: 没想过见到你居然会觉得高兴

translation.en: -First time for everything. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 凡事都有第一次 汉娜在哪儿？

translation.en: -Where's Hannah? -On her way to the lighthouse.
translation.zh: 凡事都有第一次 汉娜在哪儿？ 她赶去灯塔那边了

translation.en: And her daughter?
translation.zh: 她赶去灯塔那边了 她的女儿呢？

translation.en: -Already there with the… -Okay.
translation.zh: 已经在那里了

translation.en: …the kidnapper.
translation.zh: 跟绑匪在一起

translation.en: He's armed. Very dangerous.
translation.zh: 他有武器 非常危险

translation.en: That's exactly what the feds said about you.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局也是这样描述你的

translation.en: You stay here. I'll send someone for you as soon as the road's clear.
translation.zh: 你留在这里等道路畅通之后 我会派人来救你

translation.en: Wait. For fuck's sake, help me outside. I'm suffocating in here.
translation.zh: 等等 天啊 先救我出去我在这里快喘不过气了

translation.en: -Come on. I got this. -[groans]
translation.zh: 来吧 我来扶你

translation.en: You gonna tell me why the CIA's lookin' for you, Lou?
translation.zh: 卢 你要告诉我为什么中情局要找你吗？

translation.en: [Lou] I used some evidence I held onto.
translation.zh: 我用了手里掌握的一些证据

translation.en: -[groans] -What kind of evidence?
translation.zh: 什么证据？

translation.en: Documents. Proving CIA involvement in the coup in Iran.
translation.zh: 证明中情局参与了伊朗政变的文件

translation.en: Ah. I can see why they'd be pissed about that. -[sighs] -Lou, they're on their way.
translation.zh: 我明白为什么他们很生气了卢 他们正在赶过来

translation.en: [Lou] Fuck, they won't care about collateral damage.
translation.zh: 见鬼 他们可不在乎殃及无辜

translation.en: You gotta get Hannah and Vee out of there.
translation.zh: 你得把汉娜和小薇救出去

translation.en: [Lou] Come on.
translation.zh: -来-压住

translation.en: [groans] This thing starts up again, I'm gonna bleed out.
translation.zh: 这伤口又崩开了 我会失血过多的

translation.en: Will you get the first-aid kit? I left it in there.
translation.zh: 你能去拿急救箱吗？我落在里面了

translation.en: [grunts] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Lou! Lou!
translation.zh: 卢！

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑

translation.en: [yells] Lou!
translation.zh: 卢！

translation.en: [Vee screams] Mommy!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: -[Vee] Mommy! -[Hannah] Vee!
translation.zh: -妈妈！-小薇！

translation.en: -[Vee] Come! Please, come! -[panting]
translation.zh: 快来！求你了 快来！

translation.en: -Vee! -I'm here, Mama!
translation.zh: -小薇！-我在这里 妈妈！

translation.en: -Up here! -I'm coming!
translation.zh: -在上面！-我来了！

translation.en: [breathing heavily] Baby?
translation.zh: 宝贝？

translation.en: -Mommy! -[Hannah laughs]
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: Hi, Mommy.
translation.zh: 嗨 妈妈

translation.en: [sighs] Hi, baby.
translation.zh: 嗨 宝贝

translation.en: We were afraid you weren't gonna show up. Weren't we, Vee?
translation.zh: 我们还担心你不会出现呢 对吧？

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Of course she's okay. She's with her daddy.
translation.zh: 她当然没事 她和她爸爸在一起

translation.en: Come, give Mommy a hug.
translation.zh: 过来抱抱妈妈

translation.en: Hey, how's-- how's Lou doin'? Is she-- Is she on her way?
translation.zh: 嘿 卢怎么样了？她过来了吗？

translation.en: Jesus, look at me. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 天啊 瞧瞧我

translation.en: Still waitin' for my mommy to come back after all these years, huh?
translation.zh: 这么多年了 我还在等我妈妈回来

translation.en: But we do need her here to finish this.
translation.zh: 但我们确实需要等她来 了结这件事

translation.en: I wanna give Mommy a hug.
translation.zh: 我想给妈妈一个拥抱

translation.en: Philip, please.
translation.zh: 菲利普 拜托

translation.en: [Vee] Please, Daddy?
translation.zh: 求你了 爸爸

translation.en: One quick hug while we wait for Lou.
translation.zh: 反正我们也在等卢 那就抱一下吧

translation.en: [laughing] Oh, I missed you so much.
translation.zh: 我好想你啊

translation.en: [whispers] Game on.
translation.zh: 游戏开始

translation.en: Daddy, may I go to the bathroom?
translation.zh: 爸爸 我能去洗手间吗？

translation.en: [Philip] Of course you can, Vee.
translation.zh: 当然可以 小薇

translation.en: But hey… Come right back, okay?
translation.zh: 但是上完就立刻回来 好吗？

translation.en: Wow, Lou is really rubbin' off on you.
translation.zh: 哇 卢对你的影响真不小嘛

translation.en: Come on, just give me the gun. We both know you're not gonna shoot me.
translation.zh: 来 把枪给我我们都知道你不会开枪打我的

translation.en: You don't know me, Phil. You never did.
translation.zh: 你不了解我 菲利普 -你从来都不了解-是吗？

translation.en: [Philip] No?
translation.zh: -你从来都不了解-是吗？

translation.en: I know that if you were gonna shoot me, you would have done it years ago.
translation.zh: 如果你要开枪打我 几年前就动手了

translation.en: I know that you're not like Lou and me.
translation.zh: 我知道你跟我和卢不一样

translation.en: You're not.
translation.zh: 你不是这种人

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause she would've shot me already.
translation.zh: 换作是她 早就开枪了

translation.en: Come on. Give me the gun.
translation.zh: 来吧 把枪给我

translation.en: You abandon me, and then you steal my baby from me,
translation.zh: 你抛弃了我 偷走了我的孩子 现在还开枪打我？

translation.en: and now you shoot me?
translation.zh: 偷走了我的孩子 现在还开枪打我？

translation.en: That shit won't work on me. Not gonna work on me anymore, Phil.
translation.zh: 你的话对我无效！我不会再上你的当了 菲利普

translation.en: [shudders] I'm not afraid of you anymore.
translation.zh: 我已经不怕你了

translation.en: And I won't let you hurt my little girl the way you hurt me.
translation.zh: 我不会让你像伤害我一样伤害我女儿

translation.en: -Hannah! -[gasping]
translation.zh: 汉娜！

translation.en: Do you remember?
translation.zh: 你还记得吗？

translation.en: Do you remember…
translation.zh: 你还记得吗？

translation.en: how it felt?
translation.zh: 感觉如何？

translation.en: [shakily] Yeah. [gasping] I remember.
translation.zh: 对 我记得

translation.en: Vee! We have to run!
translation.zh: 小薇 我们得跑了

translation.en: Vee!
translation.zh: 小薇？

translation.en: [Hannah] Oh shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Vee?
translation.zh: 小薇？

translation.en: Game's over, okay? Come here, Little Rabbit.
translation.zh: 游戏结束了 好吗？来 小兔子

translation.en: [groans] We gotta go right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在就得走了

translation.en: Oh! Oh, baby. Come on. Get up. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 宝贝 来吧 起来 你没事吧？

translation.en: Did he hurt you? He didn't hurt you, right?
translation.zh: 他有没有伤害你？他没伤害你吧？

translation.en: Oh! Hide. Hide. Hide.
translation.zh: 躲起来

translation.en: Lou.
translation.zh: 卢

translation.en: -Hannah. -[Hannah] Come on.
translation.zh: -汉娜-快来

translation.en: -[clattering] -We need to move.
translation.zh: 我们得走了

translation.en: -[Philip] Vee? -[gasps]
translation.zh: 小薇？

translation.en: -My gun. -[Hannah] Lost it.
translation.zh: -我的枪-弄丢了

translation.en: -Knife? -Stuck in Philip's hand.
translation.zh: -刀呢？-插到菲利普的手上了

translation.en: Try that hatch. Go, go, now.
translation.zh: 试试从舱口出去 快去

translation.en: -Wait, your jacket's stuck. -[Lou] Oh fuck.
translation.zh: 等等 你的外套卡住了 该死

translation.en: [Hannah] Push you up.
translation.zh: 把你推上去

translation.en: Run to the end of the beach. -Run as fast as you can. -No!
translation.zh: 你得跑到海滩尽头 有多快就跑多快

translation.en: -I'll meet you there. -Don't leave me.
translation.zh: -别离开我-我会来找你 我们爬不出去

translation.en: We won't fit. You gotta run now. Go, go, go, go.
translation.zh: -别离开我-我会来找你 我们爬不出去 现在快跑 去吧 小兔子 快跑！

translation.en: Run, Little Rabbit! Run!
translation.zh: 现在快跑 去吧 小兔子 快跑！

translation.en: [Lou] It's rigged. I can't defuse it.
translation.zh: 都混在一起了 没法拆弹

translation.en: Could buy us some time if I can change the frequency.
translation.zh: 如果改变频道 或许能争取一点时间

translation.en: -Wait. Where are you going? -[panting]
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？

translation.en: One of us was actually a Girl Scout.
translation.zh: 咱俩当中有个真正的女童子军

translation.en: -Do you still have the radio? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你还带着对讲机吗？

translation.en: Maybe we can use it after all. Go bust that gate open.
translation.zh: 也许终于能派上用场 去把舱口踹开

translation.en: [Philip] Lou?
translation.zh: 卢

translation.en: We're all here.
translation.zh: 我们都在这儿

translation.en: We're all here.
translation.zh: 我们都在这儿

translation.en: I was hoping that we could all do this together.
translation.zh: 我一直希望我们可以一起做这件事

translation.en: -Face to face! -[bleeping]
translation.zh: 面对面

translation.en: So that we could end this… the right way.
translation.zh: 好让大家都以恰当的方式做个了结

translation.en: End this right.
translation.zh: 以恰当的方式做个了结

translation.en: As a family.
translation.zh: 全家人一起

translation.en: As a family.
translation.zh: 整个家庭

translation.en: But sometimes, you don't get what you want.
translation.zh: 但有时候你无法一切如愿

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: -[gasping] -[Philip yells] Fuck!
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: [screams] Fuck! You fuckin' let me in!
translation.zh: 你他妈的让我进去！

translation.en: Oh shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -[Lou] Oh shit. -[Hannah] What?
translation.zh: -该死-什么？

translation.en: -[Lou] The CIA's on the hunt. -[barks]
translation.zh: 中情局出动了

translation.en: [panting] They comin' for Philip or you?
translation.zh: 他们来找菲利普还是找你？

translation.en: They won't want either one of us to leave here alive.
translation.zh: 我和菲利普都别想活着出去

translation.en: -Go, go. -No.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: -I'll just slow you down. -I'm not gonna leave you here.
translation.zh: -不 我只会拖慢你的速度-我不能把你撇下

translation.en: Lou, go get your granddaughter to safety. I'll catch up.
translation.zh: 卢 去把你的孙女带到安全的地方 我会追上来的

translation.en: [yells] Fuck!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Vee…
translation.zh: 小薇

translation.en: Oh! Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: Oof!
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: You're a brave little girl. You know that?
translation.zh: 你是个勇敢的小女孩 你知道吗？

translation.en: Good. Help me up, will you?
translation.zh: 帮帮我好吗？

translation.en: Okay, listen to me. I want you to go grab a stick, okay?
translation.zh: 好 听我说 我要你去找一根木棍 好吗？

translation.en: The longest one you can find. Go, go, go.
translation.zh: 尽量找一根最长的 去吧

translation.en: -Mommy! -Hey, baby.
translation.zh: -妈妈！-嘿 宝贝

translation.en: Hannah. The radio.
translation.zh: 汉娜 对讲机

translation.en: [Hannah] In my pocket.
translation.zh: 在我的口袋里

translation.en: -[Lou] Come on. -[Hannah] Help me.
translation.zh: -来吧-帮帮我

translation.en: -All right. -Come on, go, run.
translation.zh: 快 快走

translation.en: Hannah, hold this up as high as you can.
translation.zh: 汉娜 尽量把它举高点

translation.en: -[Hannah] Are you calling for help? -[Lou] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你是在求救吗？-对

translation.en: [Lou] Yeah. That ought to get their attention.
translation.zh: 是的 这应该能引起他们的注意

translation.en: You gotta go. Take the road back towards town.
translation.zh: 你赶紧走 沿着这条路往镇上走 把贾克斯带上

translation.en: -Bring Jax with you. -You… you come with us.
translation.zh: 沿着这条路往镇上走 把贾克斯带上 你跟我们走吧

translation.en: Hannah, you take care of your kid…
translation.zh: 汉娜你要照料好你的孩子

translation.en: I'll take care of mine.
translation.zh: 而我会照料我的孩子

translation.en: I left a letter for you at my house. Make sure you find it.
translation.zh: 我在家给你留了封信 一定要找到它

translation.en: Okay. Go on, Vee.
translation.zh: 走吧 小薇

translation.en: Oh, God damn it.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: Don't die on me now, Lou.
translation.zh: 卢 你可别死了

translation.en: Everything that matters is right here in front of you.
translation.zh: 你眼前的就是最重要的一切

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Go. Now!
translation.zh: 去吧 快点！

translation.en: I'm sorry, kid.
translation.zh: 对不起 孩子

translation.en: -Hey, Vee. -[Vee] Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 小薇-嘿

translation.en: [Rankin] Hello, Jax.
translation.zh: 你好 贾克斯

translation.en: Hey, you got two bracelets now.
translation.zh: 嘿 你现在有两条手链了

translation.en: Yeah. Just like you.
translation.zh: 对 就像你一样

translation.en: One's for a friend.
translation.zh: 一条是为了纪念朋友

translation.en: [man] So, out of the blue, she just leaves you and your daughter this house?
translation.zh: 她突然就把这房子给了你和你女儿？

translation.en: Mm-hm. Yeah, this house and a ton of frozen deer meat.
translation.zh: 是的 这间房子还有很多冷冻鹿肉

translation.en: It's open.
translation.zh: 门没锁

translation.en: -Hey, Han. -[Hannah] Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 汉娜-嘿

translation.en: Oh, hello.
translation.zh: 你们好

translation.en: You guys still around?
translation.zh: 你们二位还没走吗？

translation.en: We had a few more questions for Ms. Dawson here.
translation.zh: 我们还有几个问题要问道森女士

translation.en: Oh. I hope I'm not interrupting.
translation.zh: 希望没有打断你们

translation.en: [clears throat] Hannah, uh, coroner's got an issue.
translation.zh: 汉娜 验尸官那边有个问题

translation.en: You're next of kin. He needs a signature to release Philip's body for burial.
translation.zh: 你是亲属 需要你签名才能给菲利普的遗体放行

translation.en: -[sighs] -Yeah. Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Ms. Dawson, did Lou Adell ever mention
translation.zh: 道森女士 卢阿德尔跟你提起过

translation.en: anything about documents from her time in the CIA to you?
translation.zh: 道森女士 卢阿德尔跟你提起过 她在中情局任职期间的文件吗？

translation.en: She'd be a pretty shit spy if she did.
translation.zh: 要是提起过 她这特务就太菜了

translation.en: If you think of anything…
translation.zh: 如果你想起任何线索…

translation.en: [chuckles] You gave me a card last time you were here, and the time before that.
translation.zh: 你上次和上上次来的时候给过名片了

translation.en: Anything at all.
translation.zh: 任何线索都行

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -[agent] Sheriff. -Good to see you again.
translation.zh: -警长 告辞-很高兴又见到你

translation.en: -Forget them. -Mm.
translation.zh: 别管他们

translation.en: Looks like you two are ready for Seattle.
translation.zh: 看来你们俩准备好去西雅图了

translation.en: Yeah, you're all packed up.
translation.zh: 你都收拾好了

translation.en: Yeah, almost.
translation.zh: 对 差不多

translation.en: I wanted to tell you, you just did a beautiful job with the memorial service.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你 追悼会办得很体面

translation.en: -Stop. -No, you did. And I think Lou would have really appreciated it.
translation.zh: 不 我是认真的 我觉得卢会很感激的

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on now. All that sincere emotion would have made her puke.
translation.zh: 得了吧 那些真情吐露只会让她作呕

translation.en: Oh, well…
translation.zh: 她这人吧…

translation.en: -She was her own person. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 她确实很有个性

translation.en: I mean, sometimes, I'm just so damn mad at her, and then…
translation.zh: 我是说 有时候我很生她的气 但是

translation.en: [sighs] Other times I miss her.
translation.zh: 有时候又很想念她

translation.en: Isn't that just how it is with family?
translation.zh: 对家人的感情不都是这样的吗？

translation.en: [Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.zh: 我向来不是话多的人我就长话短说了

translation.en: "The house is yours. Sell it."
translation.zh: 房子归你了 拿去卖掉吧

translation.en: "There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.zh: 冰箱的肉够贾克斯吃一个月还有给你一些现金

translation.en: "Life doesn't give you second chances, but sometimes it does offer a fresh start."
translation.zh: 人生没有二次机会但有时候它允许你重新开始

translation.en: "Hannah, you're going to wonder why I did it." "Why I left this all for you."
translation.zh: 汉娜 你会好奇我为什么这么做为什么把这一切留给你

translation.en: "The simple answer is,
translation.zh: 简单来说

translation.en: you'll leave the world a better place than I did."
translation.zh: 你留给这个世界的东西会比我留下的东西更美好
